import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Outlet, NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { BurgerVeggie as Burger } from "react-burger-icons"; import logo from "../assets/efecto360_white.png"; function Layout() { function scrollMain() { window.scroll({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth", }); } const [isClosed, setIsClosed] = useState(false); const toggleClosed = () => setIsClosed(!isClosed); let activeStyle = { transition: "0.3s", color: "#000", backgroundColor: "#2c91e3", padding: "0px 15px 0px 15px", borderRadius: 12, fontSize: "15px", }; let activeStyleOff = { transition: "0.3s", color: "#242738", backgroundColor: "transparent", padding: "0px", borderRadius: 0, fontSize: "14px", }; let activeStyleAbout = { transition: "0.3s", color: "#000", color: "#000", }; return (
